name: legal
description: Legal document workflows: editing, redlining, clause search, research, data rooms. Use for contract review, precedent search, legal research, and document assembly.

actions.name: documents convert
actions.description: Convert DOCX to Markdown preserving document structure. Input: DOCX file path. Output: Markdown file with sections mapped. Use when user needs editable text from a contract.

parameters.name: input_path
parameters.description: Path to DOCX file to convert.

parameters.name: output-dir
parameters.description: Directory where Markdown file will be written.

parameters.name: preserve-structure
parameters.description: Keep section hierarchy in output (default: true).

actions.name: documents edit
actions.description: Edit a specific section of a DOCX document. Input: DOCX path, section ID, new content. Output: Modified DOCX. Use when user wants to change a specific clause.

parameters.name: input_path
parameters.description: Path to DOCX file to edit.

parameters.name: section
parameters.description: Section ID to edit (e.g., '3.2', 'definitions', 'indemnification').

parameters.name: content
parameters.description: New content for the section. If omitted, removes the section.

parameters.name: output
parameters.description: Output DOCX path for modified document.

actions.name: documents redline
actions.description: Generate Word Track Changes between two DOCX versions. Input: original and modified DOCX paths. Output: DOCX with Track Changes markup. Use when user needs to review changes between contract versions.

parameters.name: original
parameters.description: Path to original DOCX (baseline version).

parameters.name: modified
parameters.description: Path to modified DOCX (new version with changes).

parameters.name: output
parameters.description: Output path for redlined DOCX with Track Changes.

actions.name: clauses search
actions.description: Semantic search for similar clauses in precedent database. Input: clause text or type. Output: matching clauses with source deals. Use when user wants precedent for a provision.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: Clause text or type to search for (e.g., 'indemnification', 'limitation of liability', or full clause text).

parameters.name: top-k
parameters.description: Number of results to return (default: 5).

actions.name: clauses index
actions.description: Add document clauses to precedent database. Input: DOCX path, deal metadata. Output: indexed clause count. Use after closing a deal to build precedent library.

parameters.name: input_path
parameters.description: Path to DOCX file containing clauses to index.

parameters.name: deal-name
parameters.description: Name of the deal for attribution (e.g., 'Acme Corp Acquisition 2024').

parameters.name: deal-date
parameters.description: Date of deal (ISO-8601 format, e.g., '2024-03-15').

actions.name: research cases
actions.description: Search legal case database. Input: search query, jurisdiction. Output: case summaries with citations. Use when user needs case law precedent.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: Search query for case law (e.g., 'tortious interference', 'breach of fiduciary duty').

parameters.name: jurisdiction
parameters.description: Jurisdiction filter (e.g., 'US-Federal', 'US-CA', 'UK', 'EU').

actions.name: research statutes
actions.description: Search regulatory/statute database. Input: query, jurisdiction. Output: statute text with citations. Use when user needs regulatory references.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: Search query for statutes/regulations (e.g., 'securities fraud', 'GDPR data processing').

parameters.name: jurisdiction
parameters.description: Jurisdiction filter (e.g., 'US-Federal', 'UK', 'EU').

actions.name: dataroom connect
actions.description: Authenticate to a data room. Input: provider, project ID. Output: session token. Use when user needs to access deal documents in a data room.

parameters.name: provider
parameters.description: Data room provider. Values: intralinks, datasite, firmex, box.

parameters.name: project-id
parameters.description: Project/deal room ID from the provider.

actions.name: dataroom download
actions.description: Download document from data room. Input: document ID. Output: local file path. Use when user needs a specific document from the deal room.

parameters.name: doc_id
parameters.description: Document ID in data room (from dataroom listing or search).

parameters.name: output-dir
parameters.description: Local directory where document will be downloaded.

actions.name: sigpage generate
actions.description: Generate signature pages from party information. Input: parties JSON, template. Output: signature pages DOCX. Use when user needs execution-ready signature blocks.

parameters.name: parties
parameters.description: Path to JSON file with party information (names, titles, addresses, entity types).

parameters.name: output
parameters.description: Output DOCX path for generated signature pages.

parameters.name: template
parameters.description: Signature page template. Values: standard, counterpart, notarized (default: standard).

notes: All commands return JSON to stdout
Use 'documents' group for contract manipulation (convert, edit, redline)
Use 'clauses' group for precedent search and indexing
Use 'research' group for legal case and statute research
Use 'dataroom' group for M&A data room access
Use 'sigpage' group for signature page generation
